section.p: This sample extends the sample in two ways:

li.p: The schema defines a specialized element loca-toc that the author can use without having to set any attributes. To make this element reliably working the XSLT script is specified with a URN.

The XSLT script has been made context sensitive. Instead of simply listing the reference topics on first level it first identifies the local-toc element currently to be resolved and then identifiers the child topic of the specific topic.
